Class.name: Report.INMOVLine
Class.ViewQuery: select SQLUser.INMOVLine.Company as INMOVLine_Company,SQLUser.INMOV.Company as INMOV_Company,SQLUser.INMOVLine.StockMovementNumber,SQLUser.INMOVLine.Number,SQLUser.INMOVLine.Item,SQLUser.INMOVLine.FromStorage,SQLUser.INMOVLine.ToStorage,SQLUser.INMOVLine.QtyRequired,SQLUser.INMOVLine.QTYPicked,SQLUser.INMOVLine.QTYReceived,SQLUser.INMOV.StockMovementNumber as HStockMovementNumber,SQLUser.INMOV.Location,SQLUser.INMOV.DateEntered,SQLUser.INMOV.Status from SQLUser.INMOVLine,SQLUser.INMOV where (INMOV.StockMovementNumber= INMOVLine.StockMovementNumber) and (INMOV.Company = INMOVLine.Company)
